cab.content: V12S E 6 R E T .r / v -.r: ' "' IJ 0-BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 9th JULY, 1918;1. WESTERN FRONT.During the night we carried out a successful raid east of ARRAS capturing a few prisoners. The enemy1s artillery has been active against the positions recently captured by us south of the SOMME.On the French front the general situation is unchanged. There are indications that the enemy may be preparing an offensive in CHAMPAGNE.2. ITALIAN. FRONT .The situation Is unchanged..ineral Staff, j/ar Office, S.W.1, 9th July, 1918. feued at 12,35 p.m.
